page.title: 05CAN RECYCLING
page.content: Our class have done a project on can recycling. Some of the activites we did were making posters, badges, games and models. We even wrote to important people like Margaret Thatcher,Leo Abse and Prince Charles. We've managed to get a can bank in our school grounds to collect cans. We have got the whole school to collect cans. We have gone to the infants school, and have done an assembly. We've also shown them the videos of us on television. The reason that we are collecting cans is that it helps a charity, it saves energy, stops litter, reduces waste and protects the enviroment. I have made my own save_a_can game called "Canservation." Our class sent it off and a few months later it came back published.
